title: FS/ T206 Mike Powers SGC 80, Tough common $285

posts.post_title: FS/ T206 Mike Powers SGC 80, Tough common $285
posts.post_content: Extremely tough common in high grade. Sharp corners, Pied 150 back, very solid card. Please send me your email for scans...First $285 gets it, thanks...
Card is available again for right now. Buyer is currently unable to proceed....
$525 for Powers and Burch, a steal.....
